item.title: Explanation of the current Model for investment
item.description: This time, I’m gonna explain the model I’m using for real investment. This model is the base model, so it will be the base when comparing with updates or changes. Here is the simple diagram of the quant process. model Every process except evaluation is calculated in rebalancing period, and evaluation is calculated in monthly. And here are simulation results. fromDate=2006-12-31, toDate=2015-12-31 Total return: 1407.9304% of 108 months
